page.title: 05THE GRAPHIC DESIGNER
page.content: We visited a graphic designer. He designs things like advertisements for pig floors and sultana packets, and he also plans out maths books and materials for schools. He designs nine packets and choses one of them and sees if the people who he works for like it. He uses felt tip pens when he does the designs, it is so neat it looks like a type writer has done it or it has been printed. On the leaflets he has to make sure he explains things properly. One of his leaflets that I thought was very interesting was about the pig floor. He has a lot of items in magazines. He designs leaflets for drinks and packets of things. He works at home, but he often has to go out to meet people in his job.
